title: Explain Yourself! + Rankings Debates, UDK Releases! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/31
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason are forced to defend their player rankings! Which players are causing the biggest differences and debates for the 2022 fantasy football season. Plus, it’s the eve of the 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 31st, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is launching on June 1st at UltimateDraftKit.com! Last chance for the lowest price!

(01:00) - Favorite UDK Features & Upgrades
(05:55) - NFL News
(13:05) - Explain Yourself! Rankings Debates
(14:20) - Gabriel Davis
(21:20) - Michael Thomas
(27:35) - Courtland Sutton
(34:00) - Diontae Johnson
(42:00) - David Montgomery
(47:50) - Cam Akers

Connect with the show:
